name: Broken Mirror (Xenix Dev)
description:
BROKEN MIRROR is a 2D puzzle platformer, made for 148th Weekly Game Jam (Theme: Mirror)

Features:

  • a perfect balance of puzzle and parkour
  • you control two characters simultaneously
  • 13 levels, which will make you think
  • hammers, lava, spikes, keys, iron bars, jump pads!
  • satisfying graphics, sounds and music
  • play in browser or download

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrows - move and jump
  • Spacebar - jump
  • R - restart level

Made with Unity
